title: ~ 1bd in North Austin - Mins to Hyde park dining & coffee -
posting_body: 💰 Listed price is factoring in the special of 6-weeks free over a 15-month lease term.
🏠 This is a spacious and well laid out 1bd in a new Hyde Park community.
10 mins to Downtown and Domain, mins to Hyde park coffee shops/grocery stores/ and dining.
~ This is a very functional layout with tons of living room space.
The bedroom can easily accommodate a queen with 2 night stands.
This community has top of the line amenities; great pool, community work areas, outdoor patios.
This community is in North/Central Austin only 7 mins to Lady Bird Lake, and easily bike-able to tons of dining and coffee shops in the North Austin/Triangle/burnet area.
😄 I'm a licensed Apartment locator and get paid by the properties so my service is 100% free.
I have been doing this job for over 5 years.
I love what I do and my goal is to make your apartment search as easy and smooth as possible.
Don't hesitate to text or call me and use my knowledge of Austin's market to assure you get a great deal on your next apartment.
